ability.name: Speed of Shadows
ability.flavor: You make multiple strikes against a foe before they even notice they're dead.

metadata.flavor: You make multiple strikes against a foe before they even notice they're dead.

effects.effect: You can use a strike signature ability four times, use a strike signature ability that gains an edge three times, or use a strike signature ability that has a double edge twice. You can shift up to 2 squares between each use.
